page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF....
page.content: I live in an owner-occupied terraced house in Dove Holes.Mum works at Peakstone offices,Dad at ICI. My brother attends Buxton Boys school. Here is a typical day:- 08.00.Dress and have breakfast. 08.45.Arrive at school with Alison. 09.00.Whistle and we start maths. 10.30.Playtime. 10.45.Lessons, this time English. 12.00.School dinner & playtime. 13.15.Lunchtime ends.Now it's art. 14.30. Playtime. l5.l5.Infants go home. We have story or project work. l5.45.Time to go home. l6.00.Play with Alison near the Bullring henge. l6.45. Have tea. l7.00.Watch TV or play on the computer. 21.30. Go to bed.
